title: Crime Alert 10.15.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 10.15.18
description:
A 24 year -old rabbi shot dead while out walking. Father of a 10 month-old calls his lawyer before 911 when he finds the child dead. Mother of six tries to get away from an abusive husband before he kills her.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
